* The Notebook (2004) - A classic romance movie that follows the love story of two young lovers from different social classes, set against the backdrop of their small town in the 1940s. It's a heartwarming and emotional rollercoaster that will leave you feeling all the feels!
* The Fault in Our Stars (2014) - A beautiful and poignant love story about two teenagers who meet at a cancer support group and fall in love. It's a powerful and moving exploration of life, death, and the meaning of it all, with some truly unforgettable moments along the way.
